inclusion.criterion: history of 15 pack-years or more of cigarette smoking
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: evidence of irreversible obstruction (FEV1<70% of predicted value, ratio FEV1/FVC<70%)
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: improvement of FEV1of less than 20% after bronchodilator in previous respiratory tests done when they were stable
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: use of oral or intravenous steroid within the preceding 30 days
exclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: history of multiresistant bacterial infection (not applicable if absence of multi-resistant bacterial infection has been proved by a negative expectoration culture in the previous 6 months)
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: bronchiectasis or recent COPD exacerbation (< 6 weeks) or diabetes
exclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: oxygen-dependant COPD patients or patients previously known with hypercapnia (PCO2>45 mmHg) at steady state
exclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: use of high doses of Advair (more than 50/500 bid) or Symbicort (more than 12/400 bid)
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: known cardiac arrhythmia such as atrial fibrillation, supraventricular tachycardia or paroxysmal auricular tachycardia
exclusion.label: met

notes: Patient has a history of systemic mastocytosis with flares, but no clear indication of COPD. However, patient's condition may be exacerbated by respiratory issues.
